sagui.footer.description: This platform has been developed by F. Gravin, Pi-GeoSolutions and Hydro Matters with the support of partners and funders. It aims to provide, water sheds of French Guyana, real-time hydrologic information with support from space data and modelisation, based on spatial data generated within the OpHySE project, funded by the SCO.
sagui.header.title: SAGUI: Hydrogeologic Space Monitoring of French Guyana for the society
sagui.stations.flow_previ.legend.descrip: Evolution compare to a reference period
